transportAdvice: Vienna has an excellent public transit network including a metro, trams, and buses that connect virtually all major tourist areas, making it easy to get around without a car. The city center is highly walkable, and taxis are widely available for late-night or less central journeys.

weather.description: Cold winter month with occasional snow and overcast skies; pack warm layers.
Still cold with possible snow, but days begin to lengthen slightly.
Early spring brings mild temperatures and occasional rain; a coat is still needed.
Pleasant spring weather with blooming parks and occasional showers.
Warm and green with longer days; one of the most enjoyable months to visit.
Warm early summer with occasional thunderstorms in the afternoons.
The hottest month; expect warm sunny days with some afternoon thunderstorms.
Still warm and summery with similar conditions to July; outdoor dining is popular.
Comfortable early autumn temperatures with fewer crowds and pleasant evenings.
Cooler and increasingly grey with autumn foliage in the parks.
Cold and often foggy or drizzly; Christmas markets begin to open late in the month.
Cold winter month with festive Christmas markets and occasional snow adding charm.
